name: Cartoon Priest
description:
Contains the following animations :

  • Aim
  • Die
  • Holster
  • Idle
  • IdleGun
  • Reload
  • Run
  • RunGun
  • Shoot
  • TakeGun

A total of 91 frames drawn on a 64x 64 canvas.

With and without black outline ! 

You can use this asset in any project you want, commercial or not. 

If you want my skills in Pixel Art in any project, ask me on Twitter or by mail !
